title: To the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England. The humble petition of Samuel Vassall Esq;
author: Vassall, Samuel, 1586-1667.
notes: "Claiming payment of money due for the service of his ship the Mayflower, and of compensation for imprisonment and losses under the late King, voted by Parliament but never paid" -- Thomason Catalogue.
Includes Parliament's resolutions dated: 28 January 1646 [i.e. 1647] and 6. May 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
